contents.content: UNIT 04 面试技巧 Interview Skills
Lesson 2 善于倾听 To Be a Good Listener
杰克和玛丽在讨论如何在面试中做一个善于倾听的人。

contents.title: 杰克：在面试中做一个善于倾听的人是很重要的。
contents.answer: Jack: It is quite important to be a good listener in the interview.

contents.title: 玛丽：认真聆听，可以体现出你对谈话者的理解与尊重。
contents.answer: Mary: Listening carefully can show you understand and respect the speaker.

contents.title: 杰克：也是个人良好素养的体现。
contents.answer: Jack: It can show your good attainment as well.

contents.title: 玛丽：此外，你也可以从对方的谈话中得到一些有用的信息。
contents.answer: Mary: Besides, you can pick up some helpful information from the talk.

contents.content: 求职面试不同于演讲，而是更接近于一般的交谈。交谈中，要认真聆听，做一个善于倾听的人，这不但可以体现出求职者的良好素养，也可以给面试官留下好的印象。

contents.title: 杰克：首先，要端正坐姿，面带微笑地注视对方。
contents.answer: Jack: First of all, you should keep proper posture and make eye contact with the speaker with a smile.

contents.title: 玛丽：可以在适当的时候，点头或是简单地发问，表示你已经明白谈话内容。
contents.answer: Mary: To show that you have understood what is said, you can nod or ask simple questions at the right time.

contents.title: 杰克：注意表述清晰，简明扼要。
contents.answer: Jack: And your statement should be clear and brief to the point.

contents.title: 玛丽：对于自己并不熟悉的话题，一定不要随意插话。
contents.answer: Mary: Never should you interrupt on a unfamiliar topic.

contents.title: 杰克：是的，以免给面试官留下不好的印象。
contents.answer: Jack: Sure, in order not to leave a bad impression on the interviewer.

contents.content: 为了表示你已听懂，或是对谈话内容很感兴趣，可以面带微笑注视对方，并且在适当的时候点头，或是提问、答话。口齿要清晰，音量要适度，答话要简练。一般情况下不要随意打断对方的问话或是抢答，否则会给人留下急躁、鲁莽、不礼貌的印象。问话完毕，如果听不懂可以礼貌地请求重复。对于不熟悉或是不能回答的问题，不要轻易插言，含糊其辞或是胡吹乱侃都可能会导致面试失败。对重复的问题也要有耐心，千万不要表现出不耐烦。

contents.title: 玛丽：另外，对于重复的话题，也不要表现出不耐烦。
contents.answer: Mary: Additionally, don't show any impatience to a repeated topic.

contents.title: 杰克：即便你对谈话内容不感兴趣，也不要显得心不在焉。
contents.answer: Jack: Don't be absent-minded even when you are not interested in the talk.

contents.title: 玛丽：总之，倾听过程中，一定不要有任何的失仪的举止。
contents.answer: Mary: In a word, any impolite behavior should be avoided in the listening.

contents.content: 当然，也要随时注意对方的反应。如果对方心不在焉，可能表示他没有兴趣，你就要设法转移话题；皱眉可能表示你的言行举止有不当之处。这时候，就要相应地做出调整，才能取得好的面试效果。

contents.title: 1.你要学会在面试中做一个善于倾听的人。
contents.answer: You should learn to be a good listener in the interview.

contents.title: 2.认真倾听是最起码的尊重。
contents.answer: Listening to the speaker carefully is the least respect.

contents.title: 3.关于这个职位，面试官对你说了些什么？
contents.answer: What have the interviewer told you about the position?

contents.title: 4.倾听时要面带微笑注视对方。
contents.answer: You should make eye contact with the speaker with a smile while listening.

contents.title: 5.随意插话会给面试官留下不好的印象。
contents.answer: Interrupting will leave the interviewer a bad impression.

contents.title: 6.对于重复的问题要保持耐心。
contents.answer: You should maintain patience for a repeated question.

contents.title: 7.在面试中不要表现出心不在焉。
contents.answer: Never should you be absent-minded in the interview.

contents.title: 8.即使对讨论的话题不感兴趣，也要保持风度。
contents.answer: You should keep your demeanor even when you are not interested in the topic.

contents.title: 9.点头表示你同意说话者的观点。
contents.answer: You can nod to show your agreement with the speaker.

contents.title: 10.倾听时要学会进行眼神交流。
contents.answer: You should learn to use eye contact while listening.
